ManeloRewriter is an amazing tool that allows you to rewrite or automatically rewrite text with two mouse clicks. A service that allows you to rewrite long texts by changing the words without changing the meaning of the subject.

With ManeloRewriter, even very long texts take only a few seconds. You don't need a long manual to use the service. Just install the application and type or paste the text you want to rewrite. With just one click, you can instantly get accurate and high-quality text rewriting. Not surprisingly, you'll be surprised at how fine the results are. You can easily compare the result with the original text. ManeloRewriter displays two versions side by side. Rewrite text in seconds The amazing thing about this tool is the speed at which it allows you to rewrite text, regardless of its size. Within seconds, your text will be rewritten and ready to be copied. You can recover raw text.

Another very useful feature of the application is that it can handle text in languages other than French. Of course, this is English, and there are more than 60 languages. And allows you to check the detected plagiarism rate.
